modName: Eraticus Maximus and Deadopolis - Bodyguard followers
summary:
These guys are giants 6'5" and 7'2" with the unarmed perk.
They will not use weapons, but are very tough in exchange for this. They can knock a person flying with a single power punch...and trust me...it's hillarious to watch them get knocked unconcious.

This mod was created by me with the program NPC Editor.
author: Kevstar
